title: Detection and quantitation of N-termini (degradomics) via N-TAILS
questions: How can protein N-termini be enriched for LC-MS/MS?
How to analyze the LC-MS/MS data?
key_points: N-TAILS enriches natural protein N-termini and neo-N-termini.
neo-N-termini are typically generated by protease cleavage.
N-TAILS can be used for analysis of protease cleavage.

workflows.name: Tails Triple Dimethyl OpenMS2.1
workflows.title: Tails Triple Dimethyl OpenMS2.1
workflows.description: Detection and quantitation of N-termini (degradomics) via N-TAILS
